entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 8.
